titles.title: Expressing support for the honoring of the City Commission of the City of Lauderdale Lakes, Broward County, Florida.
Expressing support for the honoring of the City Commission of the City of Lauderdale Lakes, Broward County, Florida.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Recognizes Lauderdale Lakes, Florida, for having elected the first city-governing body of its size that is comprised solely of women of color.
Commends the city for its progressive goals of representation by both women and people of color.
